sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>For license duration of subscription and license type of full or upgrade, set license type to subscription. </description> <name>Set license type to subscription</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[function migrateSubscriptionEntitlements() { var grEnt = new GlideRecord('alm_license'); grEnt.addQuery('product_type', 'IN', ['full', 'upgrade']); grEnt.addQuery('license_duration', '2'); // subscription grEnt.setWorkflow(false); grEnt.setValue('product_type', 'subscription'); grEnt.updateMultiple(); }
migrateSubscriptionEntitlements();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-05-30 18:39:12</sys_created_on> <sys_id>4ae983a8e77133004c6f07d8d2f6a963</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Set license type to subscription</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">bd1f72f347213110020ba9f8536d43db</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_4ae983a8e77133004c6f07d8d2f6a963</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-12-23 06:08:58</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
